file_content.text: Look, you had your shot. You don't get to go again.
Go on, cry to your milk momma, you baby!
Hope you enjoy yourself. Boom!
Hey, what's this then? Another wower looking to make a little scratch on the side, I'll bet. What'll it be, then? Running or betting?
Care to explain?
What, you don't know? This is the most spectacular, fantastic, other superlatives included, fun-for-all-ages event of your lifetime, friend!
Where's my salute, soldier?
Show respect.
Fresh on the ground, are ya? You really want me to salute you so some separatist sniper can spot you're an officer? I suppose I can give it a try....
I heard the magic word: betting.
The latter.
Oh, it's a kindred spirit we've got here! You're gonna make us so happy!
This is a blasted minefield.
Running or betting on what?
Woohoo, we've got ourselves a smart one! Everyone look out, Captain Intellect here is gonna wow and amaze you!
Ignore this moron. He thinks he's clever. Lucky for him he's so handsome or he'd be no use at all.
We've got a little obstacle course here. You can run the course, or you can bet on other runners. Mostly the refugees run, but you're welcome to play, too.
What do I get if I win?
And the prize?
Credits, fabulous credits!
You call this an obstacle course!
But it's a minefield!
An obstacle's no fun if it doesn't have a little kick!
You're crazy.
No, no, it's the game that's crazy--crazy fun that is!
Look, these poor sods have nothing, and we don't have enough supplies for even half of them.
So we let them gamble. The credits help pay for more supplies, and when one of the refugees gets lucky, they get enough gear to really help them out.
Fair enough.
So get your credits out!
I don't imagine you get a lot of people running this course twice.
And the losers?
Not everyone who loses dies.
Yeah, some of them are just really, really injured. We even have some veterans who keep coming back for more.
I should kill you all where you stand.
You don't deserve to live.
Why does everyone keep saying that?
Anyway, if you wanna bet or run the course, just see Ensign Peters. He'll set you up.
Sounds like fun to me.
All right.
Good, Peters can give you the ground rules and take care of you....
Your conduct is disgusting--wait until your superiors hear about this.
I'm reporting this.
Haha. Yeah, go tattle all you want! I'm sure that drunk ethics officer at Fort Garnik is gonna care.
Dregg, shut up!
What? Oh yeah. Nevermind. Forget about that.
Nope, nothin' to see here. Don't mind the explosions.
